title: Merchandise exports (current US$)
name: tx.val.mrch.cd.wt
readme: Merchandise exports show the f.o.b. value of goods provided to the rest of the world valued in current U.S. dollars.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Merchandise exports show the f.o.b. value of goods provided to the rest of the world valued in current U.S. dollars.
